title: Hjärnarps GIF
text:
Hjärnarps GIF is a <a href="Sweden">Swedish</a> <a href="association%20Football">football</a> club located in <a href="Hj%C3%A4rnarp">Hjärnarp</a> in <a href="%C3%84ngelholm%20Municipality">Ängelholm Municipality</a>, <a href="Sk%C3%A5ne%20County">Skåne County</a>.
Background.
Hjärnarps Gymnastik-och Idrottsförening were founded in 1926 and currently have around 250 members and 17 teams.
Since their foundation Hjärnarps GIF has participated mainly in the middle and lower divisions of the <a href="Swedish%20football%20league%20system">Swedish football league system</a>. The club currently plays in Division 7 Skåne Nordvästra which is the ninth tier of Swedish football. They play their home matches at the Hjärnarps IP in Hjärnarp.
Hjärnarps GIF are affiliated to the <a href="Sk%C3%A5nes%20Fotbollf%C3%B6rbund">Skånes Fotbollförbund</a>.
